name: Roller Golem
description:
Darcy Phillips and Samuel Wright with additonal help from Audrey Castillo.

Play as a small rolling golem in a surreal floating world made entirely of clay. Make the journey to Golopoilis by rolling at top speed while collecting clay on the way.

This game is fairly incomplete and faced a lot of difficulites developing. However it is playable from start to finish. 

This is a prototype, made using Mudbun which is an unconventional modelling method using voxels in order to construct objects using a combination of blended primitives.

How to play:

Help the rolling golem reach Golopolis by collecting 7 holy "quasar spheres" whatever they are. Reach the end of the level after you've collected all of them to finish.

Please use a Controller! Xbox is prefered.

Left Trigger to Boost
Right Trigger  to Brake
Sticks for Camera and movement
A to jump
Y to talk

Keyboard is a lot worse of an experience, just there for accessability.
